``MAC Address Types`` :version:`1.20.0`
=======================================

.. code-block:: hexpat

    #include <type/mac.pat>

| This file contains a type to visualize IEEE 802 MAC addresses
|

------------------------

Types
-----

``type::MACAddress``

**Visualizes a IEEE 802 MAC address.**
